analyzed: ▁ ā lamb a ṇ adāyak avagga
▁ aṃ ko l apupph iy attheraapadāna
▁ aṃ ko l apupph aṃ ▁pa gg ayh a

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā aṅkolapupphiyo thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
